User cliks to customer field

User types elif in to name box
User clicks save button
User should see elif in the customer field

steps.name: User clicks Repairs module
User clicks Filters button
User selects Quotations filter
User should be able to see only corresponding to Quotations filter repair orders in the list
User should see Quotations filter in the Search box
User should be able to see Quotations filter as selected in Filters dropdown menu
User deselects Quotations filter
User should be able to see all repair orders in the list
User should not see Quotations filter in the Search box
User should be able to see Quotations filter as deselected in Filters dropdown menu

steps.name: User clicks Repairs module
User clicks Filters button
User selects Confirmed filter
User should be able to see only corresponding to Confirmed filter repair orders in the list
User should see Confirmed filter in the Search box
User should be able to see Confirmed filter as selected in Filters dropdown menu
User deselects Confirmed filter
User should be able to see all repair orders in the list
User should not see Confirmed filter in the Search box
User should be able to see Confirmed filter as deselected in Filters dropdown menu

steps.name: User clicks Repairs module
User clicks Filters button
User selects Ready to Repair filter
User should be able to see only corresponding to Ready to Repair filter repair orders in the list
User should see Ready to Repair filter in the Search box
User should be able to see Ready to Repair filter as selected in Filters dropdown menu
User deselects Ready to Repair filter
User should be able to see all repair orders in the list
User should not see Ready to Repair filter in the Search box
User should be able to see Ready to Repair filter as deselected in Filters dropdown menu

name: Filter Functionality for Search Repair Orders Verification
description: Agile story: As a User I should be able to filter the repair orders

steps.name: User is logged in to briteErp Login Page
User clicks to Repair module on Landing Page
User click to Create button
User click to ProductToRepair button
User click to SearchMore button
User should be able to see a list of products
User click to Create/Edit button
User should see grey text "Product name"
User should be able to enter his name
User should be able to choose a ProductType
User should be able to enter an InternalReference
User should be able to enter a Barecode
User should be able to choose a Category
